attributes.action: Stop the UK government from giving the Welsh assembly more powers.
attributes.additional_details: The Welsh assembly want more powers, the way they have politically used the pandemic to there advantage, so no to more powers
attributes.background: Stop the Welsh assembly from having more powers. As they have enough now.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not aware of any proposals from the Government or Parliament to extend the powers devolved to Wales.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
